title: ios专用MCPE 0.4.0 v3版本mod大全
txt_content:
ios0.4.0终于出了基本的mod{:10_512:}{:10_512:}{:10_512:}
注：此mod为0.4.0 v3版
别忘了去掉空格！

去雾
             dl.drop box.com/u/68898649/0.4.0rev3mods/No.Fog.mod

增加渲染距离
             dl.drop box.com/u/68898649/0.4.0rev3mods/Render.Distance.Increase.mod

更多插糟
4：          dl.drop box.com/u/68898649/0.4.0rev3mods/4.Slots.mod
5：          dl.drop box.com/u/68898649/0.4.0rev3mods/5.Slots.mod
7：          dl.drop box.com/u/68898649/0.4.0rev3mods/7.Slots.mod
8：          dl.drop box.com/u/68898649/0.4.0rev3mods/8.Slots.mod

平滑光照
             dl.drop box.com/u/68898649/0.4.0rev3mods/Smooth.Shader.mod

两倍的行走速度
             dl.drop box.com/u/68898649/0.4.0rev3mods/2x.Walk.Speed.mod

天然洞穴Mod
             dl.drop box.com/s/yh2dc7l4cacsd0b/CavesinMCPE.mod

跳得更高
3X：         dl.drop box.com/u/75688839/rev%203%20mod/Higher.Jump.mod
超级跳       dl.drop box.com/u/75688839/rev%203%20mod/Suprr.Jump.mod

改变一天日夜的时间
20分钟：     dl.drop box.com/u/75688839/rev%203%20mod/20.Day.Night.mod
50分钟：     dl.drop box.com/u/75688839/rev%203%20mod/50.Day.Night.mod

创造模式有鸡蛋
             dl.drop box.com/s/h5162jpu6dr2zjd/Eggs.in.creative.mod

打火石在创造模式
             dl.drop box.com/u/75688839/rev%203%20mod/Flint.and.Steel.mod

生物Mod
英文原文：These work differently and unfortunately are not straight forward, how these work is they turn any item drops into the mob of your choice. These mobs will not have full health and I have tested an arrow will one hit one of the creepers. The item drops will be converted when you reload the map, so if you are playing survival with creeper mod left patched and don't want creepers every where, pick up the item drops before quitting.
鸡          dl.drop box.com/u/101792330/Everything%20in%20creative%20mods/0.4.0.5/Chicken.in.Creative.mod
牛          dl.drop box.com/u/101792330/Everything%20in%20creative%20mods/0.4.0.5/Cow.in.Creative.mod
JJ怪        dl.drop box.com/u/101792330/Everything%20in%20creative%20mods/0.4.0.5/Creepers.in.Creative.mod
猪          dl.drop box.com/u/101792330/Everything%20in%20creative%20mods/0.4.0.5/Pig.in.Creative.mod
羊          dl.drop box.com/u/101792330/Everything%20in%20creative%20mods/0.4.0.5/Sheep.in.Creative.mod
骷髅        dl.drop box.com/u/101792330/Everything%20in%20creative%20mods/0.4.0.5/Skeleton.in.Creative.mod
蜘蛛        dl.drop box.com/u/101792330/Everything%20in%20creative%20mods/0.4.0.5/Spider.in.Creative.mod
僵尸        dl.drop box.com/u/101792330/Everything%20in%20creative%20mods/0.4.0.5/Zombie.in.Creative.mod

在生存飞行
            dl.drop box.com/u/101792330/Fly.in.Survival.mod

replies.txt_content: 谁可给个0.4.0 v3 的下载网址，我的是v2的
